content:
Thanks, I checked the link you suggest but I can't understand. When I try to POST parameters to my URL [base]/$cql, I get this error:
...
"severity": "error",
"code": "not supported",
"diagnostics": "Invalid request: the FHIR endpoint on this server does not know how to handle the POST operation [$cql] with parameters [[]]"
...

There may be some deployment issues but I can't figure out which ones...

@Andrea Olianti , we have recently completed a fairly major refactor of the CQF Ruler. I just tried the $cql operation on the latest docker container and it is giving me errors, I'm looking into that now.
